page.title: 09School Day
page.content: clubs in our dinner break.We have three playtimes.The first is at 10.45am till 11.00am.The second one is at midday till 1.15pm.We have our dinner between these two times.The last playtime is at 2.30pm till 2.45pm.We have a few animals at school which are four guinea_pigs,five chickens,nine rabbits and one baby duckling.We also have some goldfish which are kept in a pond in the play ground.The clubs after school are Netball,Book club,Cricket and Choir. The clubs in school are Drama, Puppets, Chess, Recorders, Art and craft and Guitars.When the fourth years leave they usually go to the The Kings School Ottery St. Mary.We have assembly at 10.30am.On a Friday we have it at 3.15pm.
